title: Ohana Real Estate Investors to Develop Montage Los Cabos Hotel and Residences
text:
Ohana Real Estate Investors
REDWOOD CITY, Calif. , Oct. 13, Ohana Real Estate Investors, LLC announces plans to break ground in December 2015 on Montage Los Cabos, an oceanfront resort in Los Cabos, Mexico expected to open in the Winter 2017-2018 season. The project will sit on the renowned Santa Maria Bay on the corridor between Cabo San Lucas and San Jose del Cabo, adjacent to the private residential community Maravilla Los Cabos. Montage Los Cabos and Maravilla Los Cabos reside within a 1,400-acre master planned community being developed by Ohana.
"Our goal is to create a high-end resort of contemporary design that sits lightly on the idyllic setting of Santa Maria Bay and is sensitive to the environment surrounding it, while offering ocean views from every hotel room and residence. Utilizing natural woods and stones as well as native plant materials from Mexico , the resort will be timeless in its design and sophistication," said Alex Hill , Executive Vice President of Development at Ohana. "A highlight of the resort will be the uniquely designed main pool spanning two levels and 20,000 square feet, offering several different experiences of interaction while abutting the sand and water of the Sea of Cortez."
Montage Los Cabos will feature 122 guestrooms, five-star amenities such as a full-service spa, the uniquely designed main pool, and multiple dining options, as well as 52 whole ownership residences. The two and three-bedroom residences – which will offer ocean views, private terraces with fire pits, outdoor showers, and access to a centrally located private residential pool – are just being released for presale reservation.
"Montage Residences Los Cabos will offer completely turnkey homes and an effortless ownership experience – from the full range of property and concierge services to the option to participate in the Montage rental program – for buyers who want contemporary, indoor-outdoor living combined with world-class amenities," said Neil Johnson , Director of Residential Real Estate at Ohana. "We have a long-standing history of success working with Montage Hotels & Resorts, and look forward to continuing that partnership in Los Cabos ."
About Ohana Real Estate Investors
Ohana Real Estate Investors is an investment, development, and management group focused on hotels and serviced residential communities. The portfolio currently includes Montage Beverly Hills, Montage Deer Valley, and Maravilla Los Cabos, a private residential community, as well as undeveloped properties in Kauai, HI and Healdsburg, CA. For more information, please visit www.ohanare.com .
